The structural variation landscape in 492 Atlantic salmon genomes

Oct 14, 2020

Our paper on SVs in Salmon was finally published in Nature Communications!

One little blip on the SV size / count spectrum lead to a connection between active transposable elements and domestication.

More to come from us in the animal SV world.
